post.author: Admin
post.title: NRMB CD/DVD Orders
post.description:
Marching Band Concert CDs and State Final DVD INFORMATION!
IF YOU ORDERED CDS AND/OR DVDS: Please
post.content:
Marching Band Concert CDs and State Final DVD INFORMATION!

IF YOU ORDERED CDS AND/OR DVDS: Please read this in its entirety regarding your CD and/or DVD order.

Marching Band Concert CDs have arrived!

They are labeled and will be distributed TO YOUR BAND MEMBER on Wednesday, DECEMBER 21! Please make sure you remind your bando to pick up the CD!!

STATE FINAL DVDs have NOT arrived!

A final copyright license is still being processed, therefore the DVDs will not be available until next year.

As soon as they arrive, we will have them distributed to your bando.

As you know, the NRHS Marching Band is the ONLY band to ‘figure out’ how to get a copy of an OMEA State Final Performance in DVD format that follows all copyright rules. Each song in the Contest show must have its own license to record. The final license is being processed and then the DVDs will be created.

WE APPRECIATE YOUR PATIENCE IN THIS ENDEAVOR!!!

If you have any questions, Contact: Amanda Kost – 440-864-6543 or memandy@ameritech.net
